thread.title_full: 'Bigg Boss 9' Day 3: Roopal opens up about her break up with Ankit Gera - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: 'Bigg Day 3: Roopal opens up about her break up with Ankit Gera
text:
The Navratri fervour is hitting the Bigg Boss hard and Arvind Vegda is only promoting his excitement surrounding his favourite festival. Smelling the coffee and waking up to a medley of songs 'Tattad Tattad' and 'Bhai Bhai', Arvind is having Yuvika, Ankit and Prince on their feet playing garba to the wake-up call song.
Further ... Â»
